price: 33.Kan ka baqa Raxmaanka sir(iyo caadba) oo la yimaada qalbi toobad keen badan.
arabic: مَّنۡ خَشِيَ ٱلرَّحۡمَٰنَ بِٱلۡغَيۡبِ وَجَآءَ بِقَلۡبٖ مُّنِيبٍ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: man khashiya al-raḥmāna bil-ghaybi wajāa biqalbin munībin
